sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"威胁，恐吓"之意。
means: threaten ： 侧重扬言要对不服从者给予惩罚，有时指某种情况所预示的恶兆。
menace ： 系正式用词，着重以脸色或某种意志给以威胁，而不用语言明白表示出来。

sentence.Network_en: The people fear not death; why threaten them with it.
sentence.Network_cn: 民不畏死, 奈何以死惧之.

sentence.Network_en: Our military ties threaten no third party.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的军事关系,不威胁任何第三方.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thrēatnian 'urge or induce, especially by using threats', from thrēat (see threat)

entry.def: If a person threatens to do something unpleasant to you, or if they threaten you, they say or imply that they will do something unpleasant to you, especially if you do not do what they want.

example.ex: He said army officers had threatened to destroy the town...
example.tran: 他说陆军军官们曾威胁要摧毁那座小镇。

example.ex: He tied her up and threatened her with a six-inch knife...
example.tran: 他把她捆起来，拿着一把 6 英寸长的刀子威胁她。

entry.def: If something or someone threatens a person or thing, they are likely to harm that person or thing.

example.ex: The newcomers directly threaten the livelihood of the established workers...
example.tran: 新来的工人直接威胁到老工人的饭碗。

example.ex: The unity of our society is threatened by troublesome and restless minorities...
example.tran: 我们社会的团结遭到了一小撮滋扰生事、不安分守己的群体的威胁。

entry.def: If something unpleasant threatens to happen, it seems likely to happen.

example.ex: The fighting is threatening to turn into full-scale war...
example.tran: 这场战斗有可能会演变为全面的战争。

example.ex: Plants must be covered with a leaf-mould or similarly protected if frost threatens.
example.tran: 如果霜冻来临，植物必须盖上腐叶土或用类似方法加以保护。

means.word_mean: 1. pose a threat to; present a danger to;
2. to utter intentions of injury or punishment against:"He threatened me when I tried to call the police"
3. to be a menacing indication of something:"The clouds threaten rain";

auth_sentence.content: Both exporting and importing threaten the question of identity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both exporting and importing threaten the question of identity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both exporting and importing threaten the question of identity.

auth_sentence.content: What we don't know can threaten our survival.
auth_sentence.res_content: What we don't know can threaten our survival.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What we don't know can threaten our survival.

auth_sentence.content: The thugs threaten to kill the President, too.
auth_sentence.res_content: The thugs threaten to kill the President, too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The thugs threaten to kill the President, too.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

Sentence.sentence: Disaster movies often portray catastrophes that destroy, or at least threaten to destroy earth's entire population.
And faculty members will be wary of any change that threatens the core curriculum in the name of moving students into the workforce.
Some argue that people are anxious and feel threatened by an inflow of new workers.

sentences.en: They entreated and threatened, but all this seemed of no avail.
sentences.cn: 他们时而恳求, 时而威胁, 但这一切看来都没有用。

sentences.en: The boss threatened to fire her.
The black clouds threaten a storm.
sentences.cn: 乌云预示暴风雨的来临。

jushi.english: They entreated and threatened, but all this seemed of no avail.
jushi.chinese: 他们时而恳求,时而威胁,但这一切看来都无用。

jushi.english: While danger threatens we must all take care.
jushi.chinese: 当有危险的时候,我们都得小心谨慎。

jushi.english: Knowing that danger threatened the sentry kept an extra careful watch.
jushi.chinese: 由于知道随时可能发生危险,那个哨兵格外加强了戒备。
